mapper.insert: insert into nuc_dida_tag (id, name, path, in_class, rank, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_system) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isSystem,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update nuc_dida_tag set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_class = #{inClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_system = #{isSystem,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, path, in_class, rank, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_system from nuc_dida_tag
